dialogue: The Earthshatterer has ruined my business...
There are random holes appearing everywhere outside this place.
There are more and more monsters about! Its too dangerous.
Can you believe skeletons are appearing in broad daylight?
No one knows where that blasted archmage lives...
Check out my stuff! I have everything you need.
Find the innkeeper. He'll give you more details.
A huge structure with granite walls rose out of the ground west of here!
